statements: UPDATE user_activity_in_ar SET interaction_result = TRUE WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_activity_in_ar SET interaction_type = 'like', interaction_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ar_object_id = 456, interaction_duration = '5 minutes' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_activity_in_ar SET interaction_duration = '1 hour 30 minutes', interaction_result = true WHERE user_id = 123 AND ar_object_id = 456
UPDATE user_activity_in_ar SET interaction_timestamp = '2022-08-15 10:30:00', ar_object_name = 'New AR Object', interaction_result = false WHERE user_id = 789
UPDATE UserActivity SET interaction_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ARSpaces SET space_name = 'Virtual Reality Room' WHERE space_id = 5;
UPDATE UserActivity SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_id = 456;
UPDATE ARSpaces SET space_name = 'New Room Name', space_owner_id = 789 WHERE space_id = 321;
UPDATE UserActivity SET activity_description = 'New description' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ARObjects SET object_name = 'Updated object name', object_category = 'New Category' WHERE object_id = 5;
UPDATE UserActivity SET activity_description = 'Updated description' WHERE user_id = 1 AND activity_type = 'Comment';
UPDATE ARObjects SET object_name = 'New Object Name', object_category = 'Updated Category' WHERE object_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE locations SET location_name = 'new_location' , latitude = 40.7128 , longitude = -74.0060 WHERE location_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET email='updated_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = '00112233-4455-6677-8899-aabbccddeeff';
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='clicked' WHERE session_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef' AND interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE user_activity SET interaction_type = 'login' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE ar_spaces SET ar_space_location = 'New York City' WHERE ar_space_id = 3;
UPDATE user_activity SET interaction_type = 'Like' WHERE user_id = 101 AND ar_space_id = 201;
UPDATE ar_spaces SET ar_space_description = 'A virtual space for gaming' WHERE ar_space_id = 301;
